features: COLD BREW COFFEE AT HOME – Save money and time by making incredibly rich and smooth cold brew coffee at home. It has never been easier and more affordable-- all you need is a Primula cold brew coffee maker for incredible results.

DO IT YOURSELF CRAFT COLD BREW - Our unique cold brew extraction process produces flavorful, full bodied cold brew coffee and tea. The perfect gift for any novice or coffee enthusiast. Something to enjoy and use for many years.

STREAMLINED DESIGN – Simply add coffee grounds to the brew filter, pour cold water over the coffee, and let brew overnight or to desired strength. Serve cold, over ice or hot. Add milk, creamer, syrups or flavorings to fit your taste preferences, or add ice for an extra refreshing cup of coffee.

HASSLE-FREE COLD BREW- Designed to make cold brewing easy and mess-free. Easy to use, dishwasher safe, effortless cleanup, durable glass construction, removable filter, and fits most refrigerator doors or shelves. Makes up to 6 cups (52 ounces) of smooth, delicious cold brew coffee.

TIME FOR COLD BREW - A slow brewed cup of cold brew coffee is the perfect way to start the day. Create the cold brew coffee you can't wait to wake up to. Primula makes cold brew simple and affordable.

WHY PRIMULA'S COLD BREW COFFEE IS BETTER - An industry leader for over 30-years. Primula always delivers the highest quality, award-winning products that are patented, thoroughly tested and highly reviewed. Striding to set the standard for satisfaction and reliability.
body.description: The Primula Burke Cold Brew Coffee Maker allows you to make smooth, craft coffee from the convenience of your own home. The Burke features a durable temperature-safe glass carafe with secure-grip plastic caging made without BPA. It fits in most refrigerator doors. The Burke also comes with a removable fine-mesh filter and a tight-sealing lid. It produces up to 6 cups of smooth, flavorful cold brew coffee that is 65% less acidic than traditional hot brewed coffee. To use, simply add coarse ground coffee or coffee bags to the filter, pour water over the coffee, and let it steep in the refrigerator overnight or desired strength. When it's ready, remove the filter, replace the lid, and serve. Pour over ice, add milk, creamer, syrups, or flavorings to fit your taste preferences. Ideal for making iced coffee, lattes, iced tea, and more. Brew, serve, and store all in the same cold brew pitcher. It keeps your brew fresh for up to 14 days when stored in the fridge and it's designed to fit most fridge doors. Be your own barista and enjoy delicious cold brew coffee at home with a Primula cold brew coffee maker!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Join the Cold Brew Coffee Craze Coolest Coffee Ever The Burke boasts a brilliantly simple design, with a fine mesh cold brew filter with temperature safe borosilicate glass cold brew pitcher with a 1.6 quart capacity, and a silicone top gasket for drip-proof service. Save Money Save yourself from trips to expensive coffee shops, and make your favorite Cold Brew and iced coffee drinks at home. The Burke keeps coffee fresh for up to 14 days! Easy To Clean The Burke Cold Brew Makers specially designed mesh filter allows for easy cleaning with its removable bottom. The carafe also cleans up quickly due to its borosilicate glass construction. Burke At A Glance Temperature-safe borosilicate glass carafe is sturdy and durable Fine mesh filter ensures your coffee blend will be as smooth as silk Removable bottom makes the Burke a cinch to clean Silicone gasket top for drip proof service Generous 1.6 quart capacity

How To Make The Perfect Cold Brew Coffee Place ground coffee beans in the brew filter. For best results, use fresh roasted, coarsely ground coffee. The reusable brew filter holds up to 16 tbps. of coffee. Insert brew filter inside carafe and slowly pour 2 cups of water over coffee to dampen. Once coffee is damp fill the remainder of the carafe with water. Tighten lid and place in refrigerator to cold brew for up to 24 hours (strength is related to brew time). For ultimate flavor extraction, stir grounds during brewing process. After you are done remove the mesh brew filter from carafe. Easily remove the bottom lid to release used coffee grounds. Always remove brew filter before pouring coffee.

The Case for Cold Brew It’s a flavor sensation for coffee lovers. Cold brew coffee is smoother, richer and mellower than its hot brewed counterpart. Of course, you can visit your neighborhood coffee shop to enjoy it, but making it is so easy and inexpensive, why not do it yourself? Cold brewing is nothing more than letting your coffee steep in cold or room temperature water for up to 24 hours. The result is more richly flavored coffee. With the Primula Burke Cold Brew Coffee Maker, you can easily brew your own cold brew coffee with a smooth, robust flavor that is less acidic than hot coffee. Enjoy the craft beverage experience at home with Primula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Easy So Nice
reviews.reviewText: This is great for making cold coffee. I find that if you put the grounds in the Pot and not the filter the flavor is incredible. I heat 48oz of water and add sugar and let it cool in the fridge for a couple of hours. Add 1 cup of grounds to the pot add the cold water/sugar mix and stir. Stir before i go to bed, stir in the morning and when the 24hr's is up stir one last time and pour it through the filter. Then add the coffee to the Nitro keg i have and enjoy. This coffee maker is well built and easy to use and clean. i recommend it to anyone who like cold coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes WONDERFUL cold brew coffee
reviews.reviewText: I don’t get the negative reviews - I LOVE this for making cold brew coffee. My tips:1. If it is taking you FOREVER to get the water to initially seep through the coffee into the pot, then you are most likely using coffee grounds that are TOO FINE for cold brew! You want to use a COURSE GROUND coffee! I really like the Bizzy Cold Brew Smooth and Sweet coffee. Don’t be misled by its name - it has NO sweetener added to it - the name just refers to the coffee’s flavor profile…2. Even though this pot says that its parts are dishwasher-safe - HAND WASH everything. All parts wash quickly with warm water and a little dawn dish soap!3. To make the coffee, I put the grounds into the filter area in the pot, add room temperature water, put the lid on and let it sit on the counter for about 5-6 hours. I take a table knife from my silverware drawer and stir the grounds around (within their filter area) a couple times during this initial 5-6 hour soak. Then, put the pot into the frig and let it soak there overnight. After about 8-9 hours in the frig I take it out, stir the grounds around again with the table knife (within the filter area), let it sit for a few minutes and then lift up the filter. Hold the filter over the coffee, tilting it a little to let as much liquid as possible drip out from the filter into the coffee. I think I tilt the filter and balance it against the pot over the coffee to let it drip that way for about 5 minutes…. Then take the filter all the way out. I dump the grounds onto a plastic tray and let them dry out - then give them to a gardener!.4. As soon as you have dumped the grounds out of the filter, unscrew the bottom cap and rinse out the filter! Then rub a couple drops (you don’t need much) of dawn blue dish liquid between your thumb and index finger and then use those fingers to rub the soap all around on the filter - inside and out. This takes only a minute or two and gets it totally clean! Rinse well and let it dry…. It gets totally clean this way with no staining!.5. I immediately transfer the coffee out of this pot into a borosilicate glass pitcher for storing in the frig.Then, HAND WASH this blue pot, with just a couple drops of dawn dish detergent. It only takes another minute to wash, rinse and invert to dry. Easy, totally clean and ready for the next use when the coffee starts to run low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bottom screw-off base is game changer!
reviews.reviewText: The ease of using the inner tube is an eleven! I have not had a cold brew set up this easy to clean. It has a thin base that unscrews and allows for something to go through it to get all off the coffee out. My other one didn’t have this feature and I dreaded trying to get the inside clean, because it was a fairly messy process. I’ve really enjoyed this purchase. Quality glass, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and functional brewer...
reviews.reviewText: I like a cup of iced coffee now and then, but don't like to pay Starbucks or other coffee house prices. The solution is to buy a cold brewer like this if you're an occasional consumer, and don't want to shell out bigger bucks for a fancier unit. There's no bells and whistles here, fully manual operation, but the brewer works, and for the price of a few store-brewed ice coffees, you've got your own thing. Just add fewer or more grounds to adjust brew strength, and sit it in your refrigerator to brew. Clean up is a bit messy, but we all suffer for what we want, right? And don't drop it, as it does have a breakable glass component. Other than that, a purchase worthy of your consideration!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to for Cold Brew
reviews.reviewText: I have to say I loved this cold brew Pitcher so much I had to buy a second one. I initially bought the red one for my mom for christmas and she absolutely loved it. And since we don't always agree on coffee flavors. I had to buy the white one for myself.I have a few other brands of cold brew pitchers , but this is by far the best. The biggest selling point is the grounds holder in the center. I love that it has the little screw piece on the bottom that releases for easy cleaning. It makes things so much easier. Because I love cold brew so much i'm basically making coffee every other day.
Wow I love the cold coffee brewer it works perfectly.just use your favourite ground coffee and follow the instructios.I drink one drink early in the morning.feel great head is clear allday.Thank you!
El filtro es fácil de retirar, sella bien aguanta calor y frío.
Great for making ice coffee at home. Super easy to use and makes great cold coffee.
Em casa usamos direto a chaleira para tudo. Água quente para chá, arroz, cozinha, bolsa térmica entre outras.

I just bought my 2nd (mint color). I decided to get back into it to save on expensive trips to Starbucks. I am super satisfied! It's cute, super well made and it's easy to make cold brew coffee with it. I suggest getting two if you're a cold brew fan, as it empties quickly. You also have to take into account that once done, when you remove the middle part that infuses the coffee, the level of the coffee goes down, so freshly made, there is already about a cup less. In my photo, the multicolor (bought years ago, I don't think this color is still available) is the one that is infusing and the mint is the one that is ready to drink. You just use a frother, in another container, with your barista oat milk (milk or cream of your choice), vanilla and cinamon (if you want : sirup of your choice in this foam preparation or/and in the coffee tumbler) and pour the prepartion on the top. I assure you that it's just as tasty and good looking as Starbucks cold brew and you save on the trip and the 7$ coffee!
